Budgets and Budgeting
lead_paragraph: Yankees and Mets fans on a budget will have to settle for seats in far-off sections, some of which have obstructed views of the field in their new stadiums.
snippet: Yankees and Mets fans on a budget will have to settle for seats in far-off sections, some of which have obstructed views of the field in their new stadiums.
